dict.string: Files renamed! Select more files to rename
File names reset! Select some files to rename
Editing this text does nothing. One day, maybe.

This application will attempt to strip annoying tags out of filenames.
e.g. My TV Show S01E01.XviD.h264.Blu-Ray.(lol-cats).avi
becomes My TV Show S01E01.avi
It will also attempt to recognise season and episode numberings and convert them to SxxExx format.
e.g. My TV Show [1x01] Pilot.avi
becomes My TV Show S01E01 Pilot.avi
To use, simply select some files, check that the suggested renamings are good and then click "Rename files".
Alternatively, select a folder (directory) and Name Clean will suggest renamings for all files in the folder and its subfolders.
If you aren't happy with the suggested renamings, click "Clear" to clear the list and select again.
